application.name: administration
application.contentSecurityPolicy: base-uri 'none'; default-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' http: https: ws: wss:; connect-src 'self' *.billwerk.com http: https: ws: wss:;  script-src 'self' open.mapquestapi.com *.twitter.com *.twimg.com *.aptrinsic.com  *.billwerk.com 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' data:; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' blob:; img-src * data:; font-src * data:; frame-src *;
